defaultBooks.title: Introduction to Algorithms, 3rd Edition
defaultBooks.author: Thomas Cormen
defaultBooks.description: A very useful book for all computer scientists. Contains algorithms that you need to know, and is used in ICS 311.

defaultBooks.title: C Programming Language 2nd Edition
defaultBooks.author: Dennis Ritchie and Brian Kernighan
defaultBooks.description: Needed for Program Structure (ICS 212). In good conditon. Cost negotiable.

defaultBooks.title: Calculus 8th Edition
defaultBooks.author: James Stewart
defaultBooks.description: STEM majors will need this for calculus classes. Slight water damage on first few pages, but still very clean and legible.
